title: Glottography dataset derived from Vuillermet 2012 "A Grammar of Ese Ejja, a Takanan language of the Bolivian Amazon"
description: This dataset provides non-overlapping, contemporary, approximate ranges for indigenous languages of Amazonia based on maps 8, 9 and 11 in Vuillermet 2012.
citation: Vuillermet, Marine. 2012. A Grammar of Ese Ejja, a Takanan language of the Bolivian Amazon. Université Lumière Lyon 2 dissertation. (xvi+736pp.)
